lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump fired off on Twitter and at rallies again on Friday, venting his anger over the news media’s coverage of his presidential campaign.

byline.original: By ALEXANDER BURNS and NICK CORASANITI

headline.print_headline: Trump’s Other Campaign Foe: The ‘Lowest Form of Life’ News Media
headline.main: Donald Trump’s Other Campaign Foe: The ‘Lowest Form of Life’ News Media

snippet: Mr. Trump fired off on Twitter and at rallies again on Friday, venting his anger over the news media’s coverage of his presidential campaign....
abstract: Donald Trump fires off number of Twitter messages attacking news media for what he claims is unfair coverage; Trump appears to have organized his campaign for president around pervasive antagonizing of press, sometimes letting his enthusiasm for criticizing news outlets get in way of focusing on his opponent and policy issues.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
